subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2018)
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Mikaela Shiffrin, who won the gold in slalom, said her dream is to repeat and win the giant slalom, downhill, super-G and super combined in the next Olympics.
snippet: Mikaela Shiffrin, who won the gold in slalom, said her dream is to repeat and win the giant slalom, downhill, super-G and super combined in the next Olympics.
